ingredients.ingredient: 4 thick slices sourdough bread, lightly toasted

cookingTips: Toast bread lightly to provide structure without drying it out completely
Warm asparagus before assembling to help melt the cheese
Cook bacon until just crispy so it's not too brittle for sandwich assembly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do you prevent the bread from getting soggy while ensuring the cheese melts properly?
